mapper.select: select p.*, pc.parent_id cateParentId, l.id ladder_id,l.product_id ladder_product_id,l.count ladder_count,l.discount ladder_discount,l.price ladder_price, pf.id full_id, pf.product_id full_product_id, pf.full_price full_full_price,pf.reduce_price full_reduce_price, m.id member_id,m.product_id member_product_id,m.member_level_id member_member_level_id,m.member_price member_member_price,m.member_level_name member_member_level_name, sku.id sku_id, sku.product_id sku_product_id, sku.sku_code sku_sku_code,sku.price sku_price,sku.stock sku_stock,sku.low_stock sku_low_stock,sku.pic sku_pic,sku.sale sku_sale,sku.promotion_price sku_promotion_price,sku.lock_stock sku_lock_stock,sku.sp_data sku_sp_data, att.id att_id, att.product_id att_product_id, att.product_attribute_id att_product_attribute_id,att.value att_value from pms_product p left join pms_product_category pc on p.product_category_id = pc.id left join pms_product_ladder l on p.id = l.product_id left join pms_product_full_reduction pf on p.id = pf.product_id left join pms_member_price m on p.id = m.product_id left join pms_sku_stock sku on p.id = sku.product_id left join pms_product_attribute_value att on p.id = att.product_id where p.id = #{id}
